title: My Cat, Pepper
body: My cat’s name is Pepper. Today she and I watched Iron Man and I showed her her namesake. She was unimpressed.

summary: Rhodey: Oh my god, are you okay? You’re sweating a lot  Tony: *Panting* Yeah, I just did a bunch of cross-fit you know the usual...
body:
Rhodey: Oh my god, are you okay? You’re sweating a lot

Tony: *Panting* Yeah, I just did a bunch of cross-fit you know the usual

Rhodey:

Tony:

Tony: Okay fine, I tried jogging with Stephen and I kept having to run to keep up

Rhodey: He’s not that fast-

Tony: WELL, HIS LEGS ARE FREAKISHLY LONG

tags: strategic homeland intervention enforcement and logistics division
title: Captain Marvel
body:
Why was S.H.I.E.L.D. called Shield in this movie, set like 20 years prior to Iron Man, but in Iron Man they hadn’t come up with that abbreviation yet and are still called the Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division?

Other than that, excellent movie. Watch it, love it. If you don’t, I hate you.

reblog.comment:

summary: Now that Stan Lee is gone, I really need Robert Downey Jr. to take up the cameos. His contract is up, but I could totally see...

summary:
Anonymous said: 
if you're still taking the sentence starter prompts i'd love fluff 
number 8 with pepperony please! nbd if...
body:
Anonymous said: if you’re still taking the sentence starter prompts i’d love fluff number 8 with pepperony please! nbd if you’re not taking them anymore i just love your writing!

I’m so happy you like my writing, anon, I love to write! Especially for my otp <33

Pairing: Tony Stark/Pepper Potts

Rating: Fluff

8. “I think you might be my soulmate.”

It’s a quiet night. The wind is almost non-existed, barely a caress against their skin, and the night sky seems closer than ever. Stars are dotting the sky everywhere, the atmosphere surprisingly clear for a change and Pepper can’t help but drink in the sight of a clear sky full of stars.

She used to fall asleep with this image in mind every night when she was younger, back when she spent her summers at her uncle’s farm during childhood. Now though, with the pollution and the big buildings obscuring the sky, as well as her busy schedule not allowing her to have time to herself, it’s been harder and harder to catch a glimpse of the stars.

The rooftop has become their getaway spot in the past weeks, if not months. Putting the world back together has been hectic to say the least, both on her part and Tony’s. They haven’t even discussed their wedding yet, wanting to put everything back in order before thinking of anything else. When the day allowed it, they’d sometimes meet on the rooftop where no one ever goes, to catch a breath of fresh air and get away from the pandemonium that surrounded them everywhere they went.

While Pepper is busy gazing at the night sky, Tony is enthralled by her face bathed in the light of the moon, spilling over her skin and making it glow in an ethereal way. The sight makes Tony choke on air, and he finds himself unable to resist cupping her face gently in his hand and bringing her lips closer to his in a short kiss.

Pepper smiles. She scoots over closer to Tony, and buries her face in the crook of his neck. She feels him blow out air as he chuckles, squeezing her shoulder nonetheless and tucking her against his side. The woman starts peppering his neck with short, sweet kisses, enjoying the feeling of his skin against her lips, eager to remind him he’s hers and that she’ll never let him go.

Tony shudders at the feeling, allowing his fiancée to shower him in gentle affections.

“I think you might be my soulmate,” Tony sighs, content.

“I thought you’d already figured that out,” Pepper laughs, and brings his face closer to hers again, rubbing their noses together as they gaze into each other’s eyes with all the love in the world.

reblog.comment:
Anonymous said: if you’re still taking the sentence starter prompts i’d love fluff number 8 with pepperony please! nbd if you’re not taking them anymore i just love your writing!

I’m so happy you like my writing, anon, I love to write! Especially for my otp <33

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Arachnida
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2TvYzhC

by ivymyst

Peter knew a thing or two about multiple realities, or so he thought. He just didn’t expect to find an alternate version of himself trying to beat the living daylights out of *him* while out on patrol one night.

“Dude! Why are you trying to kill me if I’m you?”

“You are not me. If you were me, you wouldn’t be so easy to take down.”

And why doesn’t he trust Mr. Stark?

-

A somewhat Spider-Verse style take on a slightly Dark Mirror-Verse MCU Peter Parker where he meets a goofier, happier version of himself in a different timeline.

Words: 2393, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Spider-Man - All Media Types
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Tony Stark
  • Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, Mirror Universe, Alternate Timelines, Dark Peter Parker, Precious Peter Parker, Dark Tony Stark, Tony Stark Has A Heart, Tony Stark Has Issues, Peter Parker Has Issues, Spider-Verse, Kinda


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2TvYzhC

title: From Start to Finish
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Uy7NGB

by MercyMae

Peter Parker, fresh out Middle School, joins the scary world of High School. With bullies, and new crushes developing, Peter learns how to fit in.

Along the way, he forms a bond between a teacher who stands out from the rest of them, and maybe…just maybe…that’s what it’ll take for Peter to find a father-figure in his life.

Words: 3011, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

Series: Part 4 of Days Ahead

  • Fandoms: Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), Iron Man (Movies), Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: General Audiences

blog.name: dropyourswordfanfic
blog.title: Faintly Familiar Fanfiction
blog.description:
i Julia, promise to write fanfic on this side blog!

ask is always open

wattpad mainblog masterlist

↓ ↓ ↓ ↓ ↓ ↓

© 2019 dropyourswordfanfic

title: NASA - Peter Parker
body:
part one - Sweetener Series

Song: NASA - Ariana Grande

Summary: trying to get your act together Spiderman comes to give you unwanted advice.

Warnings: fluff, curse words

You had been giving everyone space. It’s what you needed to figure your shit out. Spending time at the observatory looking at the stars made you feel at home. Like no one could touch you. Until one day a certain webbed hero followed you to your hideout.

“What the fuck dude!” You yelp as he swings gently side to side.

“Sorry,” Spider-Man took off his mask to reveal the only face you enjoyed to see, “I saw you coming this way and i was curious why.”

“Just wanted to look at some stars and planets,” you walked your way around his hanging body.

Thumping the ground as he lands clumsily from the ceiling, Peter joins you by the telescope. Watching you watch the sky he was probably too close for comfort. All he wanted to do was kiss you, hard. But that would not be smart and he knew that, so he stepped away.

“Everyone has missed you at school. Mostly me though,” He blushed vigorously.

“Really?” you brush off, “Well i miss you too.”

“Why have you been coming here?” he asked engulfed in curiosity.

“It’s comfortable here. I don’t have to pretend,” You glance toward him, “Why did you follow me?”

“I really needed to talk to you, know you were okay,” Peter looked to the floor embarrassed.

Walking over to him you lifted his chin making him look you in the eye. “If anyone understands how that feels it’s me Peter,” you hug him tightly not letting go for anyone.

“It’s actually harder at school without you,” Peter confessed.

“What are they doing now?” you sighed exhausted just hearing about it.

“They keep hammering on and on about how your not showing up to hide the fact that we got back together,” Peter cried out.

“That is the stupidest thing i ever heard in my life!” You waved your arms around. Kinda wishing your never knew this in the first place.

“I know!” he tried to come in for another hug but you lashed out.

“No!” you pushed him away, “this is why i haven’t been showing up. I need some damn space.” you breathed out.

“I’m sorry (Y/N),” Peter stepped back, “I’ll leave now.” he put on his mask getting ready to swing away.

Pondering for a moment you thought that was a bad idea. You definitely needed to spend more time with him, more time with somebody even if you were protesting the world or you might go crazy.

“Wait!” You turned around quickly to see him stopped in his tracks, “Don’t leave yet. We can watch the stars for a while,” a pink appears on your cheeks.

“I’d like that,” he gently smiles from under his mask.

As a little bit of time passed you were comfortable talking to each other face to face about nothing and everything. Until footsteps started coming closer and closer toward your location.

“Shit,” you said annoyed.

“What?” Peter asked not sure what was happening.

“The people who work here. We have to get out before we get caught,” you scrambled to your feet.

“Alright,” Peter came to your rescue as Spider-Man, “Hold on tight.”

Swinging through the city with Spider-Man brought back a mixture of emotion and memories. But in the end you loved Peter so much for caring enough to keep your hide out just that, a hide out. No exposure or kicking out for trespassing. When he landed at your window you didn’t move, just looked up at him in his mask. Reaching for the edges you tug at them gently to take it off. Peter starts to help you and whips it off like it was nothing.

Staring into each others eyes you felt so close to one another. Peter leaned down and kissed your cheek with his soft lips lingering, wrapping your arms around his neck you pull him even closer. A shocked Peter put his hands on your hips and you stood there saying a non verbal goodbye. Pulling away from each other you went your separate ways to be alone the rest of the night.

——————————————————————————————-

a/n: you thought they were going to kiss! HA HA! happy international women’s day <3

Tag List: @doubleuwu @choke-me-sweet-pea @living-dead-parker @loki-in-hogwarts @rainbow-marvel

title: Попытки (не) убежать
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2CbmBDT

by yasno

Отец Питер всегда был неравнодушен скорее к мужчинам, нежели к женщинам, и с течением времени осознание этого факта всё больше угнетало его. Тони его добил. Пробудил в Питере нечто, что тот изо всех сил старался в себе похоронить. Уже некоторое время он всё чаще мыслями возвращался к тому, что либо он силой своей веры всё же погребёт этот грех в себе, либо погребут его.

Words: 900, Chapters: 1/?, Language: Русский

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Tony Stark, Natasha Romanov (Marvel)
  • Relationships: Peter Parker/Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Priest Peter Parker, Young Tony Stark, References to Drugs, Hurt/Comfort, But also, Hurt No Comfort, Slow Build, Slow To Update, Some angst


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2CbmBDT

blog.title:
Fandom!
(largely Marvel Fandom)
blog.description: I'm a nerd who gets sucked into tons of fandoms, here is where I will gather my fandom love. Let’s be honest though, at this point this is like 99.99% Marvel and of that percentage 99% of it is Avengers Academy related.
